name: With U
introduction: I have seen many friends around me choose a long-distance-relationship, which is also a common phenomenon to the increasing couples in the whole nation.The lack of communication and companionship is the biggest obstacle for those who choose a long-distance-relationship.

This application uses unique forms and methods like Delayed Sending, Gift Exchange and Create Topic to solve the communication problems such as the lack of companionship between long distance couples.

name: Best Roommate
introduction: The Best Roommate App is a budding startup with the goal of offering an uncomplicated and trustworthy platform for city dwellers to locate roommates within their urban vicinity. This conceptual framework aims to foster an engaging and tailored journey for the younger demographic, who are currently at the forefront of the rental housing landscape.

name: Sugar ribbon
short_description: Communication support for diabetes patients and their families

name: Glow Festival
short_description: Graph and communication design for Glow festival
